titles.title: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide relief for servicemembers with respect to contracts for cellular phone service, and for other purposes.
Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006 - Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to allow members of the Armed Forces who are called to active duty for a period of not less than 90 days to cancel or suspend their cell phone contracts without incurring early termination or reactivation fees.
